BAI SACH CHROUK

Bai sach chrouk is a traditional Cambodian dish made of pork and rice. It is typically served with a pickled cucumber and a side of fresh vegetables.

4 servings 30 minutes
THIS IS AN ADVERT

Equipment

  • Pot for cooking the rice
  • Pan for cooking the pork
  • Bowl for assembling the dish

Ingredients

  • Pork
  • Rice
  • Pickled cucumber
  • Fresh vegetables

Directions

  1. Cook the rice according to package instructions.
  2. In a separate pan, cook the pork until it is browned.
  3. Add the pork and rice to a bowl and top with the pickled cucumber and fresh vegetables.
